verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> A Song הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת <WH4609> of degrees לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> of David הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold מַה־ <WH4100> how טּ֭וֹב <WH2896> Behold how good וּמַה־ <WH4100> and how נָּעִ֑ים <WH5273> and how pleasant שֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> to dwell אַחִ֣ים <WH251> [it is] for brethren גַּם־ <WH1571> again יָֽחַד׃ <WH3162> together

כַּשֶּׁ֤מֶן <WH8081> ointment הַטּ֨וֹב ׀ <WH2896> [It is] like the precious עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָרֹ֗אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head יֹרֵ֗ד <WH3381> that ran down עַֽל־ <WH5921> upon הַזָּקָ֥ן <WH2206> upon the beard זְקַֽן־ <WH2206> beard אַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> [even] Aaron's שֶׁ֝יֹּרֵ֗ד <WH3381> that went down עַל־ <WH5921> upon פִּ֥י <WH6310> to the skirts מִדּוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH4060> of his garments

כְּטַל־ <WH2919> As the dew חֶרְמ֗וֹן <WH2768> of Hermon שֶׁיֹּרֵד֮ <WH3381> [and as the dew] that descended עַל־ <WH5921> upon הַרְרֵ֪י <WH2042> upon the mountains צִ֫יּ֥וֹן <WH6726> of Zion כִּ֤י <WH3588> For שָׁ֨ם ׀ <WH8033> there צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> commanded יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> for there the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּרָכָ֑ה <WH1293> the blessing חַ֝יִּ֗ים <WH2416> [even] life עַד־ <WH5704> for הָעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for evermore
